info.description: This is v1.0 of the SQA3D dataset.

annotations.situation: I am facing a window and there is a desk on my right and a chair behind me.
alternative_situation: I stand looking out of the window in thought and a radiator is right in front of me.
I am looking outside through the window behind the desk.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the edge of the couch with a curtain right next to me on the left.
alternative_situation: I got up from the couch and there was a coffee table to my right.
I sat on the couch and to my right was the coffee table.

annotations.situation: I am drying my hand with the towel.
alternative_situation: I just finished washing my face on sink to my left now grabbing a towel on rack to dry my face with my left hand.
I washed my hands in the sink and to my right was the toilet.

annotations.situation: I am throwing something out and I am between two office chairs.
alternative_situation: I looked out of the window and to my right and left were desks.
I opened up the window and to my right was an office chair.

annotations.situation: I am standing in front of the mirror while brushing my teeth.
alternative_situation: I walked over to the sink to wash my hands and behind me was the bathtub.
I am facing the sink washing my hair with shampoo as I look into the mirror in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am facing the door and there is a file cabinet on my left.
alternative_situation: I want to open the door in front, there is a file cabinet on my left side.
I am about to open the door in between the bookshelves, there is a file cabinet on my left side.

annotations.situation: I am doing maintenance on a radiator while there is a table with lots of chairs behind me.
alternative_situation: I looked through the window and beneath it was the radiator.
I am facing the window on the left side of the radiator, I am enjoying the warmth coming from the radiator in front of me near my feet.

annotations.situation: I am standing in front of a copier and facing the printer.
alternative_situation: I just finished using the photocopier on my right side now walking towards the printers in front of me.
Walking past the copier on my right I head for the printer ahead and to the left.

annotations.situation: Refilling the soap dispenser.
alternative_situation: I want to fetch some soap from the soap dispenser just below the paper towel dispenser.
I pull the lever on the paper towel dispenser and there is a mirror to my left.

annotations.situation: Just got my bag and was about to head outside for some groceries
alternative_situation: I am trying to reach for the bag on the bookshelf.
I am facing the bookshelf looking for a book to read on my bed behind me.

annotations.situation: I am standing in front of the door and the bookshelf is on my right side.
alternative_situation: Just returned my book back into bookshelf on my right now leaving room to go eat breakfast downstairs.
I am leaving room via door in front of me as I place a book back on the bookshelf at the same time with my right hand.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair which is very close to the window and I am facing the table I am at while there is a window to my left and a chair on the same side of the table with me to my right within reach.
alternative_situation: I placed my computer down on top of the table and to my right were two chairs.
I sat at the table and to my right was a chair.

annotations.situation: I am washing my hands.
alternative_situation: I lean over the kithen counter and get soap from the soap dispenser just to my left.
I washed my hands in the sink and to my right was a stove.

annotations.situation: I am facing a drawer, while there is a cabinet behind me and a chair at my left.
alternative_situation: I just finished organizing the dresser behind me and now I am going to empty the boxes on top of the drawers.
I've just taken a pen from the cabinet behind me.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the left cushion of a couch facing a cabinet.
alternative_situation: I am sitting on the edge of the couch trying to read what's written on the board that is on my 1 o'clock.
I opened small cabinet in front of me to look for my tax return. Couch is behind me.

annotations.situation: I am exiting the room.
alternative_situation: I decided to exit through the door in front of me and there was a table to my right.
I am standing between the two tables and facing the door so I can push it open to leave the room.

annotations.situation: Sitting by the table while looking at the backpack in front of me over the table.
alternative_situation: I am filing a form while a form on the table, there is a whiteboard behind me.
I want to get a marker pen on the table to write some notes on the whiteboard behind me.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair by the short end of a table, while having a window on my right and a table behind me.
alternative_situation: I am sitting on a chair facing the desk doing my homework and window to my right

annotations.situation: I am taking some notes for the class. My seat is in the first row and there are no more chairs on my left.
alternative_situation: I am walking past the large gray-topped table on my right going toward the blackboard.
I am standing backwards in the green chair left of the black-topped table looking at the blackboard.

annotations.situation: I am seated on a chair with plenty of room in front of me.
alternative_situation: I want to drop some papers into the trash can on the left side of the desk.
I want to drop some trash in one of the trash can between the file cabinet and the desk.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the edge of the bathtub with the shower curtain to my right within reach.
alternative_situation: I am washing my hands in the bathroom sink.
I washed my hands in the sink after I got out of the bathtub behind me.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the chair in front of the table and right behind me is the whiteboard hanging against the wall.
alternative_situation: I sit down in this side of the table because there is good weather outside and I can see it thanks to the window on my right.
I took a seat at the table for the meeting and the door was to my right.

annotations.situation: I am reaching for a cold beer inside the refrigerator.
alternative_situation: I am looking in the refrigerator trying to find some milk to drink.
Looking for snacks in the refrigerator.

annotations.situation: I just entered the bathroom from another room with a washing machine.
alternative_situation: I am passing through the doorway and I can feel the change of temperature as I leave the small room.
I am standing by the door frame heading towards the white door to leave this room completely.

annotations.situation: I am standing in front of a grey rug on the floor and the door is on my immediate right.
alternative_situation: I am standing on the rug while looking at my reflection in the mirror in front of me by the sink.
I am walking past the door on my right to wash my hands in the sink.

annotations.situation: I am facing a washing hamper, while there are some washing machines behind me.
alternative_situation: I placed my dirty clothing into the laundry hamper in front of me and behind me is the washing machine.
I was done with the washing machines behind me and placed the liner on top of the laundry hamper in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am facing a cabinet, while having a bed on my left and a couch on my right.
alternative_situation: I've just switched off the lamp on the nightstand to the right side of the bed.
I am standing in front of the nightstand behind me, wondering if the bed to my left is a water bed.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair facing the square table I am at while there is a long table behind me and there is no other chair on the same side of the same table with me.
alternative_situation: I sat at the table to study and there was a chair to my right.
After sweeping the floor near the long table behind me and pouring some hand sanitizer from a dispenser in my four o'clock direction, I spotting the bread crumbs under the table in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am facing a screen projector and there is a chair on my left and a table behind me.
alternative_situation: I am pulling down the projector screen in front of me for my upcoming presentation.
I am adjusting the position of the projector screen.

annotations.situation: I am looking out the window while standing between two tables and the radiator is within reach.
alternative_situation: I want to open the window on the left side of the picture to allow more air into the room.
I had to close the window because I was cold, and the couch was to my right.

annotations.situation: I am throwing trash with the TV to my right within reach.
alternative_situation: I shut the TV off to my right and walked towards the door in front of me.
I want to drop some trash paper in the trash can on the left side of the TV.

annotations.situation: I am crouching fixing the radiator and to my left is a cabinet.
alternative_situation: I am adjusting the room temperature on the radiator in front of me as I look out the window to pass time.
I decided to open up a window and the cabinet was to my left.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair typing on the keyboard with a cabinet behind me and a chair to my left.
alternative_situation: I shut off the monitor because I was done for the day and to my right was the door.
I am sitting on a chair and desk and watching a movie on my computer monitor in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am facing a window and there is a water cooler on my left. My back is facing the middle of the table.
alternative_situation: I am looking out the window in the center. The table is behind me.
I looked outside of the window at the sun and behind me was the table.

annotations.situation: I am throwing trash with the microwave on my left.
alternative_situation: I threw away my pizza into the trash can and to my left was the microwave.
I am throwing trash away right of the cabinets right of the water cooler I am using to fill my cup.

annotations.situation: I am making my bed and there is a long cabinet behind me.
alternative_situation: I walk over to the bed to get some rest and behind me is a shelf.
I am standing at the foot of the bed, looking at the patient.

annotations.situation: I am standing in front of the microwave waiting for the popcorn to be ready.
alternative_situation: After entering the room through a door on my right, I check if my lunch is already warm.
I am taking the sauce out of the microwave while the noodles boil on the stove behind me.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the office chair in between two desks and there is a board on my 1 o'clock direction.
alternative_situation: I am standing next to being office chair behind me and wondering if the dark brown table could carry my weight if I stood on it for fun.
I am standing in front of the chair that is behind me and looking at the dark brown table wondering who sits on that desk.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair facing a desk.
alternative_situation: I have just downloaded a song using the laptop on the desk just below the picture.
I am working at the desk while staring at the pictures that were hung on my room walls.

annotations.situation: I am facing a door, while there is a shelf on my right and a trash can behind me.
alternative_situation: Grabbing the door to shut to the room with the shelf.
Tired from cleaning the shelf on the right , I dropped a paper bag in front of the door facing me.

annotations.situation: I am standing on a white table and looking at round coffee table across the room.
alternative_situation: Leaving the big table going to sit in a chair in front of the coffee table to drink coffee.
I am standing with my back to a table and looking at the chair that is pushed out from the table.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a black coach facing a bookshelf in front while there is another bookshelf on my right.
alternative_situation: I want to get a book from the bookshelf to the right side of the cabinet.
I dropped my backpack on the couch behind me because it was heavy . Now I am looking at the bookshelf in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the red chair with my feet on the footrest.
alternative_situation: I relaxed in the chair and lay my feet on top of the footrests.
I sat down into the chair and there was another chair in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am leaning on the cabinet looking at the monitor.
alternative_situation: I just grabbed a wine glass from the cabinet behind me, now going to sit on the chair in front of me.
I am leaning against the shelf and looking at the bed.

annotations.situation: I am facing a desk and a monitor while there is an end table to my left and a chair to my right.
alternative_situation: I' m standing in front of the desk left of the office chair and staring out the window in front of me , thinking about lunch.
I am standing by desk with a monitor on my right and looking through the window watching for the pizza guy to arrive at my door.

annotations.situation: I am opening the door to get out of the bathroom.
alternative_situation: I headed towards the door in front of me and to my right was the sink.
Going to leave the bathroom through the door in front of me after taking a shower on my left.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the leftmost cushion of the couch facing the wall with a whiteboard.
alternative_situation: I am sitting on the end of a couch and facing the wall with a whiteboard and a table behind me at 7 o'clock.
I am sitting in the chair close to the door facing the whiteboard waiting for my appointment.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the sofa chair and there is a bed to my left, we use the bed to sleep.
alternative_situation: I am seated on the ottoman just before the sofa chair as I wait for an email on the laptop on the table.
I am casually sitting on the ottoman behind me and I can see my bed hair displayed in mirror in front of me.

annotations.situation: Sitting on the edge of the bed facing the mirror in front of me.
alternative_situation: I am to the right of the ottoman in front of the mirror putting on my wig.
I fixed my hair in the mirror and behind me was the bed.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the leftmost part of a couch and there is a coffee table in front of me and a seat is in my one o'clock direction.
alternative_situation: I relaxed on the couch and behind me was the table and chairs.
I sat down on the couch and placed my glass down on top of the coffee table in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am sitting in a chair at a table with one table to the right of me and one table to the left.
alternative_situation: I am standing on the left side of the table located in the center trying to decide where I should sit.
I am standing on the left side of the table located in center beside chair wondering what today is today.
I am standing in the middle of the room on the left side doing pushups while tables and chairs are to my vicinity to the right
I am standing on the spot on the left side of the room speaking to my wife on the phone, a table in ahead of me to the left and a table is to my right.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the leftmost part of a couch and there is a lamp on my left within reach.
alternative_situation: I set down on the end of the couch and realize I forgot to get my book off of the table in front of me.
I sat down on the couch and grabbed the book on the end table to my left.

annotations.situation: I am opening a door with a door next to it on my left.
alternative_situation: I am standing in front of double door, directly one on the right side, trying to figure out how this door can be locked from the outside.
I am facing the right-most door of a set of double doors with a dresser to my right.

annotations.situation: I am reading a book that I took from the shelf on my right side on the chair.
alternative_situation: I am about to place some coffee on the coffee table in front of the couch.
Getting up out of the chair in the corner to go and fluff the black pillow on the couch.

annotations.situation: I am facing the bathtub and there is a door on my right.
alternative_situation: I am cleaning the bathtub below the soap dish.
I am facing the bathtub, right side. One leg in the tub to get and shower.

annotations.situation: Standing by and looking outside through the window while having a table on my left and a chair on my right.
alternative_situation: I am standing on the right of the high table looking out the window for the pizza man to arrive.
I am standing right of light colored table looking out the window so I can people watch.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair, while there is a desk behind me.
alternative_situation: I got out of the chair and behind me was the desk.
I am sitting on the chair gazing at the corner of the top right corner of the wall in disgust.

annotations.situation: I am looking for a tie in the shorter dresser in the room directly right from the folded ladder.
alternative_situation: I am looking at my image in the mirror.
Standing in front of the dresser, getting hair items from on top.

annotations.situation: I am staring at the door and there is a backpack to my immediate right.
alternative_situation: I left the room through the door in front of me but I forgot my backpack on the right side of me.
I forgot my backpack on top of the cabinet on my right side as I walked out the door in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am picking up the rope through the window in my around nine o'clock direction.
alternative_situation: I am looking for an outfit to wear in the mess of clothes on the hangers in front of me to wear to a party on the weekend.
I am looking for my coat in the coat closet in front of me , reaching with my left hand.

annotations.situation: Standing in between two tables and facing the wall.
alternative_situation: I am standing in middle of room, table to my right doing pushups.
I am standing in between the two tables, larger table is to my right side talking on the phone.

annotations.situation: I am facing a counter, while having some doors on my left and a copier behind me.
alternative_situation: Walking towards the bulletin board above the cabinet to read any new updates.
I had just finished using the copier behind me, heading to the trash can in front of me to my right to discard paper.

annotations.situation: I am putting things on the nightstand with the bed on my right.
alternative_situation: I grabbed my charger from my nightstand and the bed was to my right.
I picked my phone up from the nightstand and above me was the window.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair facing the table with a chair on my right and another on my left while the trash can is on my right.
alternative_situation: I took a chair and sat down at the table and there was a chair to my right.
I sat down at the table for the meeting and to my left were two chairs.

annotations.situation: I am throwing trash into a trash can, while having a door on my left within reach and a table on my right.
alternative_situation: I am standing in the bottom right corner of a large table with both my hands touching the table in front of me.
I am throwing garbage in the trashcan and there is a door to my 7 o'clock direction.

annotations.situation: I am facing a bed, while having a shelf far away on the right.
alternative_situation: Looking up at the canopy, while lying on top of my bed.
I am about to sleep on the bed below the canopy.

annotations.situation: I am closing the door so that no one can come in when I use the bathroom.
alternative_situation: I want to get out of the room through the door on the left side of the light switch.
I am facing the door using my right hand to reach the door handle on right of door to pull it open so I can leave.

annotations.situation: I am facing a table and there is a door behind me.
alternative_situation: I take a seat down in a chair and there are many chairs to the left and right of me.
I have my left hand on the back rest of the chair one closest to the blue door, the door is behind me.

annotations.situation: I just entered the room and there is a bench in front of me. There are some bags on the bench.
alternative_situation: I dusted off the bench first and now I am putting on my 4 bags to make the room more tidy.
I am grabbing the two bags on the bench in front of me to place on the desk to my right so that I can start working on my school project.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair with a backpack on top and facing the table.
alternative_situation: I am sitting on the chair with a backpack sipping a cup of water on the table in front of me.
I am sitting at the table eating a slice of pizza and there is a sink behind me across the floor.

annotations.situation: I am facing the refrigerator and there is a microwave on my left.
alternative_situation: I am about to get a fruit from the refrigerator on the right side of the microwave.
After washing my face in a sink in my ten o'clock direction, I am looking for some ice for a tea I left on a table behind me.

annotations.situation: I am washing my hands.
alternative_situation: I am washing the dishes and the microwave is on my left.
I walk a few steps back and turn left to get water from the sink.

annotations.situation: I am I am sitting on the armchair in front of the window.
alternative_situation: I want to place a glass on the round topped table to the left of the couch.
I am sitting in an armchair with a table in front of me and a refrigerator to my left at 9 o'clock.

annotations.situation: I am lounging on a blue chair sipping on a martini while the lamp on the left side is on.
alternative_situation: I am sitting on the blue sofa chair enjoying a glass of red wine , the lamp is to my left.
I am resting on the sofa chair on the right side of the lamp.

annotations.situation: I am facing a shelf while there is a window and a curtain to my right.
alternative_situation: Enjoying the sunshine from a window on my right with my hand on a chair on my left, I am looking for some paper on a shelf in front of me.
I am looking at a shelf right in front of me with a window to my right and a chair to my left.

annotations.situation: I am picking up a guitar with another guitar on my left while there is a door in my around twelve o'clock direction.
alternative_situation: I am facing the couch on the right side of the room and I am trying to pick up the guitar with my left hand on my left hand
I am picking up my guitar with my left hand beside me as I face the black couch in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on an armchair that is in front of a coffee table, while having an armchair on my left and another one behind me.
alternative_situation: I am enjoying my coffee on the chair facing the white round coffee table in front of me.
I am in an armchair at a white table. There is a lighter colored armchair behind me.

annotations.situation: I am checking the radiator, while there is a coffee table right behind me.
alternative_situation: I want to turn switch off the radiator in front of the coffee table.
I am standing in front of the radiator and looking at the bookshelf.

annotations.situation: I am standing in front of the window with the chair behind me.
alternative_situation: I am standing in the middle right in front of the window looking outside for pedestrians.
I opened up the window because I was hot and the desk was to my right.

annotations.situation: I am pulling the curtain while standing next to the cabinet on my left.
alternative_situation: I am facing the curtain to open it, the bed is to my right.
I am looking at the curtain and the bed is to my right.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair and there is a table next to me with a trash can standing by.
alternative_situation: I am sitting in a chair with a coffee table right in front of me and a table to my right.
I am putting the stuff on the end table in the desk drawer directly in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am sleeping on the bed facing the closet while there is a desk on my right.
alternative_situation: I am on top of the bed daydreaming as I stare at the open dresser drawer in front of me.
I am lying on the having a restless sleep with my head on the pillow.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair under the whiteboard and facing the desk with another chair on my left.
alternative_situation: I am standing in front of the chair behind me, trash bins to the right of the chair and trying to work on my desk in front of me.
I am working at a computer tower on the table.

annotations.situation: I am in the bathtub and the door is on my left side.
alternative_situation: I got into the bathtub and shut the shower curtain to my left.
I sat down in the bathtub and shut the shower curtain to my left.

annotations.situation: I was called to examine the projector and I am doing it right now.
alternative_situation: I am standing behind the table in the middle of the room facing the sketch I drew on the large whiteboard or glancing out the window on my right.
I am standing and operating the projector in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am lying on the bed with my head on the pillow and facing the cabinet.
alternative_situation: I lounging on the bed while reading a horror novel facing the cabinet.
I am on the bed looking at the cabinet.

annotations.situation: I am standing by a door and a curtain to my right and facing the desk.
alternative_situation: I am sitting on the chair thinking about a huge mess I made by placing clothes on the floor to my left.
I walked over to my desk and to my right was the curtain.

annotations.situation: I am facing a bed, while there are two recycling bins on my immediate right.
alternative_situation: I am going to bed, after throwing away something in the recycling bin.
I want to get on the bed on the right side of the cabinet.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the office chair fixing my clothing.
alternative_situation: I am sitting on the chair doing my school project on the table in front of me.
I sat down at the table to get work done and my bed was behind me.

annotations.situation: I am looking at the rack to the left side of the cabinet opposite the bed.
alternative_situation: I am sorting out my clothing rack before I head to my bed behind me on right to nap.
I am standing and facing the clothing rack on top left corner of the room looking for my dress shirt.

annotations.situation: I am organizing a cabinet and there is a radiator on my right.
alternative_situation: There is so much dust on top of this cabinet in front of me, the window that is on my right must be responsible.
I searched for my phone in the cabinet and behind me was my desk.

annotations.situation: I am shaving in front of the sink.
alternative_situation: I am rinsing my fingers through the sink slowly as I check my face in the mirror in front of me.
I applied makeup at the bathroom vanity and to my left was a curtain.

annotations.situation: I am using the laptop on desk because some monitors on my right are not working properly.
alternative_situation: Reading the chat on a laptop in front of me, I notice that the game is already downloaded on a monitor in my 2 o'clock direction.

annotations.situation: I just dropped off the soda can to the trash can by the desk.
alternative_situation: I am reaching down to the right to get a drink out of the mini fridge.
I threw away my snack into the trash can and to my right was the mini fridge.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on the bed facing the window with the desk on my left.
alternative_situation: I am sitting on the edge of the bed watching the window in front of me for flying birds.
I got out of bed behind me and walked over to the window straight ahead to see what was going on.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on an end of the table between two chairs facing the cabinet.
alternative_situation: I am standing in between the two chairs at the head of the table, facing the cabinet and wondering if the cabinets are locked or open.
I am leaning on table between two chairs trying to watch the TV on my front left ahead of me.

annotations.situation: I am picking up my backpack while the machine is in my twelve o'clock direction.
alternative_situation: I am inserting coins into the machine in front of behind so I can use the photocopier behind it.
I am putting coins into the machine using my right hand to use photocopier in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am having some snacks on the couch with a desk in front of me across the room.
I am sitting on the bathroom vanity and the trash can is to my left.
alternative_situation: I am facing the bathroom door in front of after washing my hands in the sink behind me.
I opened the door and the sink was behind me.

annotations.situation: I am using the toilet.
alternative_situation: I grab some toilet paper to the left of me and flush the toilet I am sitting on.
I have just finished cleaning the toilet on the left side of the bathtub.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair and there is one chair on my left and another chair on my right.
alternative_situation: I am cleaning the desk immediately in front of me, there is a table on my right side.
I am sitting at the desk and typing on the keyboard.

annotations.situation: I am working on my computer and there is a whiteboard behind me.
alternative_situation: After stacking the stack of chairs that is on my 4 o'clock , I returned to work on my monitor in front of me.
I am standing bottom left corner of the table trying to speak while people are listening to me on the people sitting on chairs in front of me on either side of the table.

annotations.situation: I am stepping on a carpet facing a table against the wall, while there is a couch on my left within reach and far away on my right an armchair.
alternative_situation: I am standing at my end table in front of me, I am admiring the picture on the wall in front of me to my right
I am looking at a table with a couch to the right in front of me and a picture on the wall also in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am facing the big cabinet, and standing just off the dark rug.
alternative_situation: I am moving away some things from the shelf on the left to this cabinet in front of me.
I am facing the cabinet, trying to read and understand the sign posted to the cabinet in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am looking at the decoration and there is a couch on my right. A green chair is on my left.
alternative_situation: I am doing a close inspection of the decoration on the wall in front of me while I lean one hand on the chair to my right.
I am making a call while standing in front of the decoration, there is a couch on my left.

annotations.situation: I am leaning on the desk without laptops while facing the red backpack.
alternative_situation: I am leaning on the desk that is behind me appreciating the computer tower that the company just gave me.
I am leaning on the desk behind me as I look at the bag in front of me wondering who's bag it is.

annotations.situation: I am sitting on a chair in the corner facing another chair at the desk.
alternative_situation: I am looking at the monitor for work and a cabinet is off to my right . I may need to open soon.
I am facing the desk at an angle and there is a chair behind me.

annotations.situation: I am facing a door while there is a bathroom vanity behind me.
alternative_situation: I just turned around from putting up my hair at the counter, and almost walked straight into the door in front of me.
I want to go to the room with the toilet through the door in front of me.

annotations.situation: I am standing in front of the TV facing my bed.
